title: Microsoft Edge: Edit image with Designer
description: Discover advanced AI-powered image editing in Microsoft Edge with Designer. Easily personalize your images by erasing objects, adding text, enhancing visuals with auto crop, removing or blurring the background, and more, all without leaving your browser. Start editing by right clicking an image in your browser and selecting "Edit image with Designer."  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the “ImageEditorServiceEnabled” policy.
